subtitle: An old fashioned combination of cheese and apple together. Serve hot with custard or hot or cold with thick Greek yogurt or cream.

method.text: Roll out the pastry to line 4 x 10 cm flan tins or 1 x 25cm flan ring. Bake blind for 20 min.
While the pastry is cooking, put the Bramley apples, sultanas and sugar in a pan. Add a little water and cook until the apples are soft.
Remove from the heat and beat to a smooth puree. Grate the Wensleydale cheese and stir into the warm apple puree. Divide the apple puree between the flan cases.
Arrange the slices of eating apple on top of the puree. Brush with honey and bake for 15 min.

title: Wensleydale cheese and apple flan
